document_title: Nasopharyngeal cancer: Causes, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_name: ung-thu-vom-hong.json_9_Examination, screening and treatment of cancer diseases at the Oncology Department, Tam Anh General Hospital
subsection_content:
Putting into use modern machines and equipment, applying multi-modality and individualized treatment models in cancer treatment, Tam Anh General Hospital's Oncology Department is a place to effectively screen and treat cancers. Cancer diseases such as nasopharyngeal cancer, laryngeal cancer, colorectal cancer, stomach cancer, liver cancer, lung cancer, breast cancer...
Tam Anh General Hospital Oncology Department brings together a team of skilled doctors and nurses, led by Dr. Vu Huu Khiem (Tam Anh General Hospital Hanoi) and Doctor Tran Vuong Thao Nghi (Tam Anh General Hospital Ho Chi Minh City), often Regularly update new regimens according to international treatment guidelines, and use newly circulated drugs to improve treatment effectiveness for patients.
The highlight of the Oncology Department of Tam Anh General Hospital is the day treatment room system with full modern amenities and facilities, equipped with a JAPANESE STANDARD CHEMICAL INFUSION CHAIR with a smart 3-motor design that makes it easy to Easy to adjust height, flexible to lift and fold, with attached screen and dining table to ensure entertainment and relaxation needs during treatment and privacy of each patient.
Sterile chemical mixing room at Oncology Department, Tam Anh General Hospital
NEGATIVE PRESSURE CHEMICAL PREPARATION ROOM with specialized sterile isolation mixing machine according to international standards (ULPA filter membrane with 99.999% filtration efficiency creates a working area that meets ISO Class 3 clean air standards, in accordance with standards American Pharmacopoeia USP 797) optimally protects the safety of clinical pharmacists when mixing drugs, minimizes the risk of drug contamination, combined with standard procedures in preparation will help provide accurate drug doses. High precision, ensuring quality and treatment effectiveness.
MOBILE EMERGENCY CABINETS LOCATED AT THE DEPARTMENT are fully equipped with medical equipment, including electric shock machines to serve emergency treatment for patients.
In particular, to ensure patient privacy, blood collection for testing as well as medicine dispensing and meal service are all arranged right at the department.
At the boarding area, the standards of a high-end hotel are placed on top with full amenities: minibar, LED screen TV, Internet, equipment to connect medical staff 24/24; 100% of medical gas systems and emergency equipment are located at the bed; The toilet is equipped with equipment to connect medical staff...
To make an appointment at the Oncology Department, Tam Anh General Hospital, you can contact:
Hotline 024 3872 3872 – 024 7106 6858 (Hanoi) or 0287 102 6789 – 093 180 6858 (HCMC)
Book an appointment online via:
Website: https://tamanhhospital.vn/danh-cho-khach-hang/dat-lich-kham/; Fanpage: https://www.facebook.com/benhvientamanh/
Or go directly to:
108 Hoang Nhu Tiep Street, Bo De Ward, Long Bien District, Hanoi City; 2B Pho Quang, Ward 2, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City
Nasopharyngeal cancer has a fairly good prognosis if detected at an early stage and with an appropriate treatment regimen. Therefore, when you see signs of discomfort in the head and neck area that persist and do not improve after a period of symptomatic treatment, you should go to the hospital for examination and early diagnosis to help the treatment be effective. best results.
